goal: My plans for Saturday night just got cancelled. My evening is free from 7 PM onwards. Find me a table for one at any sushi restaurant in downtown Austin with at least 4.5 stars and book it. Then, block off a 90-minute slot on my calendar for 'Solo Sushi Night' starting at whatever time you booked.
